servinfo.title: Excessive engine oil consumption – Oil leakage
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model and Engine Basic Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model .

condition.ptxt: Excessive engine oil consumption – Oil leakage

action.ptxt: Cylinder Head Inspection:For J20 Engine or Cylinder Head Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
Camshaft, Tappet and Shim Inspection:For J20 Engine or Camshaft, Tappet and Shim Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
